chapters.title: Chapter 10:  A Blazing Beacon
chapters.info:
Lord Aedmun Matherin,
      p. 269 (317)—High Seat of
      House Matherin in Andor.  Elayne paid his estates
      a visit to ensure his loyalty after she took the throne—his House
      is too small to be of much help before, but a good ruler prepares for
      the after as well as the before.
